fdInfo.des: 赦免是国家宣告对犯罪人免除其罪、免除其刑的一种法律制度，包括大赦和特赦。我国现仅规定有特赦。

element.def: 实施了犯罪行为的人。在我国特赦实践中，其多为战争罪犯。
决定对犯罪人特赦的权力机关。我国为全国人大常委会。
向犯罪人宣布特赦令的机关。
对犯罪人实行特赦的时间。
对犯罪人实行特赦的时间。
对犯罪人宣布特赦的时间

This FE denotes the the illegal act that the Offender is pardoned for.

They demanded a pardon to John for inadverdent manslaughter.

An intentional action performed by the Authority  that accomplishes the pardon. 

But Queen Mary, pitied his youth and pardoned him by a bill addressed to her chancellor, Stephen Gardener from St.James's, on 18th March 1554.

Any description of the act of pardon which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (quietly, loudly) and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). It may indicate salient characteristics of an Authority that also affect the action (presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully).

The location at which the pardoning takes place.

On 1 March 2002, Andreyev was found guilty of libel and conditionally sentenced
to two years in prison and then pardoned in the courtroom.

An action that the Authority intends to accomplish by pardoning

U.S. research on biologicals started in World War II and was greatly augmented by captured Japanese research and scientists, who were pardoned to help the U.S. efforts.
